document_data.mainbody:
lorde was a human who lived in Neverwinter in the late years of the 15 century DR.
Clorde was merchant, but this was a cover for his true profession he was a member of Bregan Daerthe operating out of Neverwinter. His wagon had the habit of "breaking down" in important locations where Clorde could gather valuable information for his employers.
Clorde survived the first attack of the "Lost Heir" of Alagondar and his plaguechanged minions of 1479 DR
